%%pyspark

from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, StringType
from pyspark.sql.functions import col, trim, regexp_replace

spark = SparkSession.builder.appName("LakeDB_Transfer").getOrCreate()

spark.sql("""
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS odw_harmonised_db.SAP_HR_Leavers (

    PersNo                 STRING,
    Lastname               STRING,
    Firstname              STRING,
    CoCd                   STRING,
    CompanyCode            STRING,
    Loc                    STRING,
    Location               STRING,
    PSgroup                STRING,
    PayBandDescription     STRING,
    Orgunit                STRING,
    OrganizationalUnit     STRING,
    PA                     STRING,
    PersonnelArea          STRING,
    PSubarea               STRING,
    PersonnelSubarea       STRING,
    WorkC                  STRING,
    WorkContract           STRING,
    OrgStartDate           TIMESTAMP,
    Leaving                TIMESTAMP,
    Act                    STRING,
    ActionType             STRING,
    ActR                   STRING,
    ReasonforAction        STRING,
    S                      STRING,
    EmploymentStatus       STRING,
    EmployeeNo             STRING,
    Position               STRING,
    Position1              STRING,
    Curr                   STRING,
    UserID                 STRING,
    EmailAddress           STRING,
    PersNo1                STRING,
    NameofManagerOM        STRING,
    ManagerPosition        STRING,
    ManagerPositionText    STRING,
    LMEmail                STRING
) 
 USING DELTA;

%%sql



delete from odw_harmonised_db.SAP_HR_Leavers where PersNo is null;


INSERT INTO odw_harmonised_db.SAP_HR_Leavers
(
    PersNo,            
    Lastname,     
    Firstname,       
    CoCd,        
    CompanyCode,        
    Loc,                
    Location,         
    PSgroup,             
    PayBandDescription,  
    Orgunit,            
    OrganizationalUnit, 
    PA,                 
    PersonnelArea,      
    PSubarea,           
    PersonnelSubarea,   
    WorkC,              
    WorkContract,       
    OrgStartDate,  -- Added OrgStartDate here
    Leaving,       -- Added Leaving here
    Act,                
    ActionType,         
    ActR,               
    ReasonforAction,    
    S,                  
    EmploymentStatus,  
    EmployeeNo,         
    Position,           
    Position1,          
    Curr,               
    UserID,             
    EmailAddress,       
    PersNo1,            
    NameofManagerOM,    
    ManagerPosition,    
    ManagerPositionText,  -- Corrected column name
    LMEmail   
)          
SELECT 
    PersNo,            
    Lastname,     
    Firstname,       
    CoCd,        
    CompanyCode,        
    Loc,                
    Location,         
    PSgroup,             
    PayBandDescription,  
    Orgunit,            
    OrganizationalUnit, 
    PA,                 
    PersonnelArea,      
    PSubarea,           
    PersonnelSubarea,   
    WorkC,              
    WorkContract, 
CASE 
    WHEN instr(OrgStartDate, '/') = 0 THEN CAST(OrgStartDate AS DATE)
    ELSE CAST(
        concat(
            substring(OrgStartDate, length(OrgStartDate) - 3 + 1, 4), '-', 
            substring(OrgStartDate, instr(OrgStartDate, '/') + 1, 2), '-', 
            substring(OrgStartDate, 1, instr(OrgStartDate, '/') - 1)
        ) AS DATE
    )
END AS OrgStartDate,

CASE 
    WHEN instr(Leaving, '/') = 0 THEN CAST(Leaving AS DATE)
    ELSE CAST(
        concat(
            substring(Leaving, length(Leaving) - 3 + 1, 4), '-', 
            substring(Leaving, instr(Leaving, '/') + 1, 2), '-', 
            substring(Leaving, 1, instr(Leaving, '/') - 1)
        ) AS DATE
    )
END AS Leaving,
    Act,                
    ActionType,         
    ActR,               
    ReasonforAction,    
    S,                  
    EmploymentStatus,  
    EmployeeNo,         
    Position,           
    Position1,          
    Curr,               
    UserID,             
    EmailAddress,       
    PersNo1,            
    NameofManagerOM,    
    ManagerPosition,    
    ManagerPositionText,  -- Corrected column name
    LMEmail      
FROM 
    odw_standardised_db.sap_hr_leavers_monthly;

%%sql

update odw_harmonised_db.SAP_HR_Leavers 
set EmployeeNo = '' 
where EmployeeNo is null

%%sql
update odw_harmonised_db.SAP_HR_Leavers 
set Leaving = '2024-02-29'
 where PersNo = '50426514'
